alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Jack; Palo Pinto; Stephens; Young (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:29AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Young, Eastland, western Jack, Stephens and western Palo Pinto Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 629 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles east of Olney to near Necessity to 9 miles north of Rising Star. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Graham, Breckenridge, Eastland, Cisco, Olney, Ranger, Gorman, Rising Star, Bryson, Gordon, Palo Pinto, Lake Cisco, Lake Daniel, Lake Leon, Possum Kingdom State Park, Gunsight, Possum Kingdom Lake, Lake Graham, Necessity and Lake Olden. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 323 and 363, and between mile markers 369 and 370. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastland; Jack; Palo Pinto; Stephens; Young
